name: 鶴鄉戀旅
description:
-NCU Game Creator(NCUGC)
NCU Game Creator serves as a game-making exchange platform for students at NCU university and is one of the student community of IDEA NCU, with a membership of 70 people from all departments of NCU. Not only provides courses for game making, but it also contributes to Taiwan's game creation through organizing various activities. To strengthen communications between Taiwan's student game-creating teams, it had held the TSGDF events twice. It holds the goal to combine the power of industry, official, and university, and work together for the development of the Taiwan Game Industry.

-Team of Love Across Izumi
The production team of Love Across Izumi is composed of 7 NCUGC members and 2 external school partners. We work as a team for the cooperation of local promoting project between NCUGC and Izumi City Hall.

Members:
Producer/ Game Planner: Boss

Tempest Digital Ltd.:
Tempest Digital Ltd. is a new startup by former NCUGC club leader Cheng Tsunhan and other partners who graduated from NCU. Engaged in computer games, mobile games, digital products, extended reality, creative curation, and gamification design. It hopes that starting from games, it can create more possibilities for digital content, and make a contribution to the game industry in Taiwan.
